sentences.sContent: Dickinson, a bioengineer, has devoted his life's work to the study of insect flight.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dickinson, a bioengineer, has devoted his life's work to the study of insect flight.
sentences.sCn: 迪金森是一名生物工程学家，他一直从事昆虫飞行方面的研究。

sentences.sContent: The company is working on ways to bioengineer better, cleaner and more efficient biofuels.
sentences.sContent_eng: The company is working on ways to bioengineer better, cleaner and more efficient biofuels.
sentences.sCn: 该公司致力于用生物工程技术研发出更好，更清洁，更高效的生物燃料。

sentences.sContent: Ning Wang, a bioengineer at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, found that the embryonic stem cells of mice are much softer than other, more specialised cells.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ning Wang, a bioengineer at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, found that the embryonic stem cells of mice are much softer than other, more specialised cells.
sentences.sCn: 位于伊利诺伊大学香槟分校的生物工程学家，王宁（音译）发现，老鼠的胚胎干细胞远比其他特化细胞要软。

remMethod.val: bio(生物) + engineer(工程师) → 生物工程师
